com.bigdata.rdf.sparql.ast.ssets

Interface ISolutionSetManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SolutionSetManager

    public interface ISolutionSetManager
    A management interface for named solution sets.

    Note: This is an internal interface that may evolve substantially.

    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson
    See Also:
    SPARQL Update , SPARQL UPDATE for NAMED SOLUTION SETS

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearAllSolutions()
      Clear all named solution sets.
      boolean clearSolutions(String solutionSet)
      Clear the specified named solution set.
      void close()
      Shutdown.
      void createSolutions(String solutionSet, ISPO[] params)
      Create a named solution set.
      boolean existsSolutions(String solutionSet)
      Return true iff a named solution set exists.

      Read the solutions from a named solution set.

      Return computed statistics for a named solution set.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init()
        One time initialization.

      • close

        void close()
        Shutdown.

      • clearSolutions

        boolean clearSolutions(String solutionSet)
        Clear the specified named solution set.
        Parameters:
        solutionSet - The name of the solution set.
        Returns:
        true iff a solution set by that name existed and was cleared.

      • clearAllSolutions

        void clearAllSolutions()
        Clear all named solution sets.

      • createSolutions

        void createSolutions(String solutionSet,
                   ISPO[] params)
        Create a named solution set.
        Parameters:
        solutionSet - The name of the solution set.
        params - The configuration parameters (optional).
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if a solution set exists for that name.

      • putSolutions

        void putSolutions(String solutionSet,
                ICloseableIterator<IBindingSet[]> src)
        Save the solutions into a named solution set. If there is an existing solution set having that name, then its solutions will be replaced by the new solutions (replace not append).
        Parameters:
        solutionSet - The name of the solution set.
        src - The solutions.

      • getSolutions

        ICloseableIterator<IBindingSet[]> getSolutions(String solutionSet)
        Read the solutions from a named solution set.
        Parameters:
        solutionSet - The name of the solution set.
        Returns:
        An iterator from which the solutions may be drained.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if no solution set with that name exists.

      • getSolutionSetStats

        ISolutionSetStats getSolutionSetStats(String solutionSet)
        Return computed statistics for a named solution set.
        Parameters:
        solutionSet - The name of the solution set.
        Returns:
        The statistics -or- null if there is no such named solution set.

      • existsSolutions

        boolean existsSolutions(String solutionSet)
        Return true iff a named solution set exists.
        Parameters:
        solutionSet - The name of the solution set.
        Returns:
        true iff a solution set having that name exists.
